sentences: Parties convened briefly in the afternoon, and agreed to continue deliberations on annexed draft text at SBI-21.

At the request of KENYA, for the G-77/China, Parties agreed to remove an invitation to non-Annex I Parties to submit views on gaps and challenges relating to support from the GEF and other bilateral and multilateral organizations, the Special Climate Change Fund, LDC Fund and other bilateral and multilateral organizations, and insurance-related actions of decision 5/CP.7.
enb_long_title: Twentieth Session of the Subsidiary Bodies to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
